variants.Description in input context: This variant, LRRK2 c.2053G>A (p.R684A), has been associated with increased kinase activity.
Variant LRRK2 c.1184A>G (p.D395G) has been shown to alter protein conformation.

Material used.Description: Recombinant LRRK2 protein and HEK293 cells were used to study kinase activity.

Readout description.Result Description: The kinase activity of LRRK2 with variant c.2053G>A was increased by 2-fold compared to wild type.
The protein conformation of LRRK2 with variant c.1184A>G was altered compared to wildtype.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA with post-hoc Tukey's test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Kinase activity within the range of 0.8-1.2 relative to control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Kinase activity outside the range of 0.8-1.2 relative to control.
